disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Powerball.

effect radius.value: 200

blurb.value: Rammus accelerates in a ball towards his enemies, dealing damage and slowing targets affected by the impact.

description.value: Active: Rammus tucks into a ball and begins to roll, channeling for up to 6 seconds, gaining 25% − 39.17% (based on level)  bonus movement speed per second over the duration, up to a maximum of 150% − 235% (based on level) bonus movement speed.

description2.value: Rammus stops rolling upon colliding with an enemy, knocking back all nearby enemies 100 units over 0.75 seconds, dealing them magic damage, and slowing them for 1 second. Powerball can be recast after 1 second.

description3.value: Recast: Rammus ends the channel early.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * The initial cast and the manual recast count as ability activations for the purposes of on-cast effects such as Spellblade, charging Spellbinder, and stacking Force Pulse. If the ability is not manually recasted, the secondary effect will trigger without being considered as an ability activation. Powerball will still collide with enemies if Rammus is ghosted. For the purpose of moving closer to an enemy when right clicking them, Powerball also reduces Rammus' attack range to 0 for the duration. Because Powerball uses center range, Rammus may still find himself not automatically colliding with targets with a radius of 135 units or larger. Instead, the player has to right click a destination that causes Rammus to attempt to roll close by the large enemy. Powerball will trigger Mana Charge twice (upon activation and when ending it prematurely). Powerball is not a movement channel, and so will not be interrupted by root and ground. The following table refers for interactions while Rammus is channeling: Type Channel Attacking Disabled Abilities Powerball interrupts. Frenzying Taunt is disabled. Tremors is usable. This ability recasts to end channel. Movement Allowed Items Usable Shurelya's Reverie Righteous Glory Youmuu's Ghostblade Spellbinder Gargoyle Stoneplate Randuin's Omen Seraph's Embrace Disabled Hextech Protobelt-01 Interrupted by All item-actives not specified above interrupt Consumables Usable Spells Usable Barrier Clarity Cleanse Exhaust Ghost Heal Ignite Smite Flash Disabled N/A Interrupted by Teleport Recall Hexflash Interrupted by Death Silencing effects

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Defensive Ball Curl.

blurb.value: Rammus goes into a defensive formation, vastly increasing his Armor and Magic Resistance, amplifying Spiked Shells' damage, and returning damage to enemies that basic attack him, but he is also slowed during this time.

description.value: Active: Rammus drops into a defensive stance for 6 seconds, gaining  bonus armor and  bonus magic resistance, becoming slowed by 30%, increasing Spiked Shell's damage by 50%, and applying it to enemies whenever they land a basic attack on-hit to Rammus. Defensive Ball Curl can be recast after 1 second.

leveling.value:
Bonus Armor:30 (+ 60 / 70 / 80 / 90 / 100% total armor)
Bonus Magic Resistance:10 (+ 30 / 35 / 40 / 45 / 50% total magic resistance)

description2.value: Recast: Rammus ends Defensive Ball Curl early.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: *The initial cast counts as an ability activation for the purposes of on-cast effects such as Spellblade, charging Spellbinder, and stacking Force Pulse. Deactivating the ability manually does not. Defensive Ball Curl ends immediately if Powerball is cast. Defensive Ball Curl will return damage from attacks and/or abilities that apply on-hit effects ( Mystic Shot) as well as from Runaan's Hurricane's Wind's Fury (will not return damage from turrets, H-28G Evolution Turret, or Jack in the Box). The resistance scaling will factor from all other sources, including Defensive Ball Curl's flat bonus. This will recalculate over the duration. The slow is reduced by slow resist.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Frenzying Taunt.

target range.value: 325

blurb.value: Rammus taunts an enemy champion or monster into a reckless assault against him. Additionally, he gains increased Attack Speed for a short time, but this bonus is extended by having any of his other spells active.

description.value: Active: Rammus taunts the target enemy champion or monster, gaining  bonus attack speed for the duration.

description2.value: While Powerball, Defensive Ball Curl or Tremors is active, the  bonus attack speed duration refreshes.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Frenzying Taunt, despite being usable on monsters, does not force them to attack Rammus. He does not draw aggro since the ability does not deal damage. The bonus attack speed's duration is separate from the taunt's duration.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Tremors.

effect radius.value: 385

blurb.value: Rammus creates waves of destruction pulsing through the ground, causing damage to nearby enemies and slowing them. Turrets take double damage from Tremors.

description.value: Active: Rammus creates an earthquake around himself for 8 seconds, slowing and dealing magic damage each second to nearby enemies for the duration. Structures receive double damage.

leveling.value:
Magic Damage Per Second:»30 / 45 / 60 / 75 / 90 (+ 20% AP)«Total Magic Damage:240 / 360 / 480 / 600 / 720 (+ 160% AP)
Structure Magic Damage Per Second:»60 / 90 / 120 / 150 / 180 (+ 40% AP)«Structure Total Magic Damage:480 / 720 / 960 / 1200 / 1440 (+ 320% AP)

description2.value: The slow persists for 1.5 seconds and stacks up to 8 times.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Spell shield only prevents one tick of the ability.
